name: A Short Adventure
description:
If you ever wanted to sit down and play a casual rpg with a light-hearted story? Look no further than "A Short Adventure"

Follow three adventurers as they escort a novice priestess to eradicate a dark spirit! Visit all of 3 locations ranging from a small town, a forest path, and an abandoned mine!

Meet your Heroes:

  • Yahto- A self-proclaimed party leader. Who gets to decide that anyway?
  • Akako- A hot-headed knight.  A loose canon who doesn't play by anyone's rules.
  • Oran- The timid sorcerer. A glass canon afraid of his own shadow. 
  • Phoena- The novice priestess. Surprisingly the most capable one here. 

If you've got an itch for classic jrpg gameplay and 30 minutes to spare, you should come and join this short adventure.
